message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident you'll find this a worthwhile investment.

Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $10,000. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is significantly lower than what I can accept.  To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.

Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet your price at $17,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $14,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and our budget.
